name: Elf in a Flue
description:
Elf in a Flue

is our entry for Yogcast Game Jam 2020.
Me and MrPersonman designed this game together.

PLAY AS AN ELF

Use Arrow Keys and Mouse to inspect the world.

I mixed up all gifts that I was meant to deliver. Help me find out which surprise gift belongs to who.

MEET AMAZING PEOPLE ON THE WAY

And find out their presents.

My friend MrPersonman's itch.io page

https://mrpersonman0.itch.io/

Thanks to following people for their assets:

-https://www.openpixelproject.com/ for their assets. We modified their game assets.

-vladpenn for Christmas Tree

- https://twitter.com/somepx for Font
